item.description: Each class is $30 per person. Reservation required by credit card. 7PM to 8:30PM Monday, November 7 -- Wines of Italy and Spain “OLD World Wines” The Spanish wine industry has been on a tear for the last two decades. Old vineyards have been revived, others have been re-planted to more exciting grape varieties, and young winemakers have embraced the newest technologies and techniques while still respecting their noble winemaking traditions. Italy went through its own renaissance in the 1970’s. Its wines are now even more fun and interesting to drink, of course fantastic with food (can you say “Osso Buco”?), and made from grapes with names that are a learning experience in themselves!

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Let's meet up for a wine tasting class!
